title.narrative: Improving output marketing performances of wheat and establishing sound market linkages

description.narrative:
Dida Farmers’ Cooperative Union is a union with 58 member cooperatives (29,211 smallholder farmers as a member) working in seven districts of Oromia region in Ethiopia. The union has four business lines in its portfolio: Agricultural commodity trading, Supply of agricultural inputs (seed, fertilizer, PP bag and agro-chemicals), Farm Mechanization and Gas station (Kerosene and Naphthalene).
Agriterra has contributed to the enrollments of a feasibility study and business plan development for edible oil semi-refinery plant investment. However, the union has prioritized purchasing a combiner harvester, above investing in a edible oil-semi-refinery factory. No significant internal capitalization has been conducted to establish linseed edible oil semi-refinery plant. For the same reason, efforts related to internal capitalization was stopped already.
In the earlier two years, 2013 and 2014, the union's output marketing performances have never been more than 600 quintals for linseed. The union had no history of wheat output marketing in those years under the circumstances where the area is known for wheat production. On top of that, the profitability of wheat per hectare ranks first followed by linseed and Niger seed. Hence, there was a limited focus of the union and member participation in output marketing, especially when it comes to wheat.
With changing union management system coupled with Agriterra Advisory services, the union started to output market 2000 quintal for linseed, 1000 quintal Niger seed, 3000 quintal of wheat.
The main focua areas of the 2016 Action plan are 1) Strengthening organizational performances, 3) Increasing the output marketing performances by more than 10%.
Activities proposed at the organization level:
- Cooperative Governance, leadership and member participation - Conduct financial management training - Follow ups on Governance coaching tracks action points. - Undertake a one day workshop to identify and implement investment options
Activities proposed at the Market level:
- Business forum between Ethiopian Grain Trade Enterprise and Dida Farmers' Cooperatives- Organize a one day discussion session among the 37 PC representatives so as to adopt and expand commission based marketing strategy. - Participation on Purchase and Marketing trainings Market linkage facilitation with different buyiers- Undertake frequnt coaching on business plan development and 3 million birr working capital access
The main focus areas of the 2016 Action plan are 1) Strengthening organizational performances, especially in relation to governance and financial management2) Market linkage for more than 16,000 quintals of wheat made between Dida FCU and EGTE.3) Increasing the output marketing performances by more than 20%
